articles.description: Ashwin's statement comes in the wake of an on-field spat between Gambhir and Virat Kohli, which garnered immense attention and controversy on social media.
articles.content: In a cricket-crazy nation like India, cricketers often bear the brunt of intense scrutiny and emotions from fans and the media. One such cricketer who has been a subject of both adulation and critici… [+2633 chars]

articles.title: Actress Raj Ripa cries on camera, levels serious allegations against filmmakers Mostafa Kamal Raz and Shariful Razz after a fight broke out during the Celebrity Cricket League in Bangladesh - Times of India
